name: Countdown Pro for Gutenberg
author: Ali Khallad

sections.description:
This plugin is a feature rich countdown block made for Gutenberg.

Gutenberg is now a core feature so please update to WordPress v5, or install the Gutenberg plugin.

Plugin Features

Works as any other Gutenberg block with the following settings:
– Square & Round styles
– Progress indicator
– Flexible digits && labels coloring and sizing options
– Flexible timer background coloring options
– Flexible border coloring options
– Animations

Development

Development location: https://github.com/bomsn/countdown-pro-for-gutenberg
sections.installation: Standard process for installing plugins. Only make sure you have the Gutenberg plugin installed.
sections.faq:
Can I remove one of the counters

Yes, yes, there are options to enable or disable specific timer (days, hours, minutes, seconds).
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • 2019-06-10
  • initial release

1.0.1

  • Added translation support
  • Bug fixes and performance improvements

short_description: The ultimate countdown block for Gutenberg, that help adding countdown functionality to your content easily.
